trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent of this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TabItem"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.
The collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "TabItem".
Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName"></xref>.
The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.

It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
The string that contains the label.

If set, this method returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name"></xref> property; otherwise this method will return the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header"></xref> property.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
